Title: Redhead
Writer: Alfred Andersch (novel), Alfred Andersch (screenplay), Helmut Käutner
Actors: Ruth Leuwerik, Rossano Brazzi, Giorgio Albertazzi, Harry Meyen
Plot: A redhead, approaching forty, is bored with her husband and with life in general. Having an affair with another man fails to produce the excitement she is craving. So she leaves Germany, seeking adventure and fulfillment in Venice, where she finds work in a hotel. Initially, life seems more interesting, and she has new romantic adventures. But when she realizes that her British lover is merely using her for a personal vendetta against a German Nazi, she finds herself running away once again.
